name: Happy Slice
description: Have you ever image to slice food like a sushi master? You may say that it takes years for them to do that. Let me give you a good news, in our game, you can slice food even better than a pro within seconds! Just click the screen as fast as you can, then you will find all food slice into the tiniest piece you have ever seen. Now you may wonder, what can I do further? The answer is: TONS OF NEW STUFF ARE WAITING FOR YOU TO TRY. You can slice up to 30 kinds of food, and use 30 types of knife to cut them, even use your socks!!! Come and have fun!
publishers: Nanjing Modoo Interactive Entertainment information technology Co
